title: Tran - est meminisse - Ad Lucretiae Morellae manes

content.description: Est meminisse dolor, quia te, mea curacurus, -a, -um, adj. = carus, -a, -um, caremuscareo, -ere (+ abl.): to miss.
content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: To remember is pain, my dear, since we miss you.
We miss you, my dear, although our grief is very small.
To have remembered your grief, my dear, is to miss you.
The memories of you that we miss are painful, my dear.

content.answer: To remember is pain, my dear, since we miss you.

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry
